name: transfer-zip
tagline: A simple file sharing service with expiring downloads
description: transfer.zip-web is a self-hosted file sharing service with drag-and-drop uploads and expiring download links. It aims to provide an easy way to send large files securely.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload files by dragging them into the browser for effortless sharing

features.title: Large File Support
features.description: Share large files that exceed email attachment limits without compression

features.title: Direct Downloads
features.description: Recipients download files directly without ads, tracking, or unnecessary steps

features.title: Multiple Files
features.description: Upload and share multiple files in a single transfer for convenience

features.title: Link Management
features.description: View and manage active file shares with the ability to delete or extend expiration
